ISSUE.TITLE: RemovedInDjango110Warning: django.conf.urls.patterns() is deprecated and will be removed in Django 1.10
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ``` RemovedInDjango110Warning: django.conf.urls.patterns() is deprecated and will be removed in Django 1.10. Update your urlpatterns to be a list of django.conf.urls.url() instances instead. urlpatterns = base_urlpatterns + patterns('', url(r'^$', views.RootView.as_view(), name='root')) ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixed #104 -- Check if activation token is stale.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: RemovedInDjango110Warning: django.conf.urls.patterns() is deprecated and will be removed in Django 1.10 #101 - resolve the warning - remove pylint errors from urls files
